iti41:2.1: “Te, bhikkhave, satta suparihina ye ariyaya pannaya parihina.
iti41:2.2: Te dittheva dhamme dukkham viharanti savighatam saupayasam saparilaham;
iti41:2.3: kayassa bheda param marana duggati patikankha.
iti41:2.4: Te, bhikkhave, satta aparihina ye ariyaya pannaya aparihina.
iti41:2.5: Te dittheva dhamme sukham viharanti avighatam anupayasam aparilaham;
iti41:2.6: kayassa bheda param marana sugati patikankha”ti.
iti41:6.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavata, iti me sutanti.
